InterfaceAsPlainText.xhtml: FUNCTION_BLOCK InductiveSensor VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR //Hardware DI_WPMetallic AT %I* : BOOL; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK MicroSwitch VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR //Hardware DI_SwitchTrue AT %I* : BOOL; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK OpticalSensor VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR //Hardware DI_WPLight AT %I* : BOOL; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK PositionTransmitter VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT //Hardware DI_PositionReached AT %I* : BOOL; END_VAR VAR END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK PresenceSensor VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR DI_WPDetected AT %I* : BOOL; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK PressureSensor VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR //Hardware AI_CurrentPressure AT %I* : INT; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK ProportionalValve VAR_INPUT //Hardware AO_SetPressure AT %Q* : INT; END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK Ramp VAR_INPUT //Hardware RampFull : PresenceSensor; END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK UltrasonicSensor VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR AI_UltraSonic AT %I* : INT; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK VacuumSwitch VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR //Hardware DI_TakenIn AT %I* : BOOL; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK Valve VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR //Hardware DO_VacuumOn AT %Q* : BOOL; END_VAR
FUNCTION_BLOCK WeightModule VAR_INPUT END_VAR VAR_OUTPUT END_VAR VAR AI_WPWeight AT %I* : INT; END_VAR
